title: WHAT IF: Tentacle Monster's Connection to DR STRANGE: MULTIVERSE OF MADNESS | Shuma Gorath EXPLAINED
author: ScreenCrush
comment: Dr Strange DID inhabit a rat in the comics with his astral form; perhaps Stephen the Rat freed Scott Lang
It’s not Shumagorath. Shumagorath can shape shift, has telepathic abilities and would not have been able to get pushed by Captain Carter at all.
I would like to see alternate Steve Rogers, Cap Falcon, Captain Carter and Bucky live action team up.

too bad that's not Shumagorath.
He doesn't have a mouth.

They've already confirmed the tentacle monster is like the one they fought in the beginning of guardians of the Galaxy 2.
description:
What If...? introduced a new BIG BAD villain to the MCU....the Tentacle Monster! We think this inter-dimensional beast is actually the Doctor Strange villain Shuma Gorath, and that it will terrorize not only the multiverse in What If, but also in the live action Docotr Strange movie. We explain the monster's connection to Captain Carter, Hydra, Spider-Man, WandaVision, and Loki.
